Class FitnessGoalController

java.lang.Object
com.example.oopproject.controllers.FitnessGoalController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/fitness-goals") public class FitnessGoalController extends Object
REST controller for managing FitnessGoal entities. Provides endpoints for CRUD operations, pagination, and filtering by user, goal type, and status.

    • getAllFitnessGoals

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<FitnessGoal>> getAllFitnessGoals()
      Retrieve all fitness goals.
      Returns:
      List of all FitnessGoal objects

    • getPagedFitnessGoals

      @GetMapping("/paged") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<FitnessGoal>> getPagedFitnessGoals(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="targetDate") String sort)
      Retrieve paginated and sorted fitness goals.
      Parameters:
      page - Page number (0-based)
      size - Page size
      sort - Sort field (default "targetDate")
      Returns:
      Page of FitnessGoal objects

      Parameters:
      id - FitnessGoal ID
      Returns:
      FitnessGoal object

    • getFitnessGoalsByUserId

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<FitnessGoal>> getFitnessGoalsByUserId(@PathVariable String userId)
      Retrieve all fitness goals for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - User ID
      Returns:
      List of FitnessGoal objects for the user

    • getFitnessGoalsByUserIdAndType

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}/type/{goalType}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<FitnessGoal>> getFitnessGoalsByUserIdAndType(@PathVariable String userId, @PathVariable String goalType)
      Retrieve fitness goals by user ID and goal type.
      Parameters:
      userId - User ID
      goalType - Goal type (e.g., weight loss, strength)
      Returns:
      List of FitnessGoal objects matching criteria

    • getFitnessGoalsByUserIdAndStatus

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}/status/{status}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<FitnessGoal>> getFitnessGoalsByUserIdAndStatus(@PathVariable String userId, @PathVariable String status)
      Retrieve fitness goals by user ID and status.
      Parameters:
      userId - User ID
      status - Status of goal (e.g., completed, in-progress)
      Returns:
      List of FitnessGoal objects matching criteria
